extends Api

      • setMission

        public void setMission(Mission mission,
                       boolean pushToDrone)
        Generate action to update the mission property for the drone model in memory.
        Parameters:
        mission - mission to upload to the drone.
        pushToDrone - if true, upload the mission to the connected device.

      • startMission

        public void startMission(boolean forceModeChange,
                         boolean forceArm,
                         AbstractCommandListener listener)
        Starts the mission. The vehicle will only accept this command if armed and in Auto mode. note: This command is only supported by APM:Copter V3.3 and newer.
        Parameters:
        forceModeChange - Change to Auto mode if not in Auto.
        forceArm - Arm the vehicle if it is disarmed.
        listener -

      • gotoWaypoint

                         AbstractCommandListener listener)

        Parameters:
        waypoint - command to jump to
        listener -
